definition: cannot escape censure (idiom)/has to bear the blame
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: Cause Lord knows I'm to blame.
sentences.chinese: 上帝知道原因，我难辞其咎。

sentences.english: The concept of unconsciousness is the very cause of these oppugns .
sentences.chinese: 究其原因，无意识概念中所包含的矛盾难辞其咎。

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
not to do one's best/not to exert oneself
to avoid (esp. responsibility)/to shift (the blame)/to pass the buck
to fail in observing or supervising/to miss/to let sth slip through
breach of responsibility/failure to carry out one's duty
to take the blame/to accept responsibility (for a mistake)
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty/malpractice
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
